cause.description:
HI MY NAME IS KYLE DEFAUSSES I AM RAISING MONEY TO GO TO AFRICA FOR A SUMMER OR TWO AND BUILD HOMES FOR THE POOR FAMILYS AND VILLAGES THROUGHOUT AFRICA LIKE HAITI IS MY FIRST PROJECT THEN ETIOPIA , THERE ARE SO MANY OPPERTUNITIES HERE TO HELP THESE FAMILYS LIVE A NORMAL LIFE JUST IMAGINE LIVING IN A HOUSE MADE OF MUD,STICKS,AND LEAVES, DIRNKING WATER FROM BATERILIZED WATER FOR YEARS, AND LAST BUT NOT LEAST THINK ABOUT DIEING AT FIVE... Thank you for joining \.. please invte many...
1. IMAGINE LIVING IN A HOUSE MADE OF STICKS,LEAVES,MUD
2. IMAGINE DRINKING DIRTY SICKING WATER YEARS ON END
3. MIN 600 PPL DIE A DAY FROM AIDS ALONE IN AFRICA
cause.name: POVERTY IN AFRICA
